attributes.action: not introduce road pricing zones to all areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ministers are considering road pricing zones instead of pay per mile.this would mean you pay more in towns and citys and less in country areas and rural roads.zones would be marked 1 in city centres and 4 in rural areas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
